titles.title: Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act of 2024
Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act of 2024
To amend the Chesapeake Bay Initiative Act of 1998 to reauthorize the Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act of 2024
This bill reauthorizes for FY2025-FY2030 the Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network and the Chesapeake Bay Gateways Grants Assistance Program.
